statements: SELECT * FROM customer_information;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_information;
SELECT last_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_information ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE email LIKE 'john%';
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customer_information WHERE last_name = 'Smith' AND policy_details LIKE '%car%';
SELECT DISTINCT policy_details FROM customer_information;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, claim_history FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM policies ORDER BY policy_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE policy_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND policy_end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, policy_amount FROM policies WHERE policy_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, policy_type FROM customers INNER JOIN policies ON customers.customer_id = policies.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM customers JOIN policies ON customers.customer_id = policies.customer_id WHERE policy_type = 'Car';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM policies ORDER BY policy_amount DESC;
SELECT policy_type, policy_amount FROM policies WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE policy_type = 'Car Insurance' AND policy_amount > 1000;

SELECT c.customer_name, p.policy_type, cl.claim_amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN policies p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id INNER JOIN claims cl ON p.policy_id = cl.policy_id WHERE cl.claim_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE policy_type = 'Home';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claims FROM claims GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT claim_id, resolution_date FROM claim_history ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, claim_id, date_filed, claim_amount FROM claims WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY date_filed DESC;
SELECT claim_id, status, resolution_date FROM claim_history WHERE resolution_amount > 5000 ORDER BY resolution_date ASC;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.policy_type, ph.status FROM customers c JOIN policies p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN claim_history ph ON p.policy_id = ph.policy_id WHERE c.customer_id = 3 AND p.start_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT policy_id, policy_number, policy_type FROM policies WHERE policy_type = 'Health';
SELECT claim_number, claim_date FROM claims WHERE claim_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT detail_id, detail_description FROM policy_details ORDER BY detail_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '123%';
SELECT policy_number, policy_type FROM policies WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY policy_type DESC;
SELECT claim_number, claim_date FROM claims WHERE claim_date >= '2022-01-01' AND claim_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT customers.customer_name, policies.policy_number, policy_details.detail_description FROM customers INNER JOIN policies ON customers.customer_id = policies.customer_id INNER JOIN policy_details ON policies.policy_id = policy_details.policy_id WHERE policies.policy_type = 'Health Insurance';
